about_the_game:
You're Hired!

"Welcome to Rosetta North, a family of elite truth-seekers, where we're as good at snooping around as we are at writing about it. That is the other side of investigative journalism, after all. Here, community, transparency, and mutual accountability form the very essence of what we do. We invite you, a free agent, into the fold as a part of our tight-knit society. Settle in, there's much to do!"

The Story

Immerse yourself in the life of Verity Lux, an acclaimed investigative journalist and one of Rosetta North's most highly esteemed members. With a knack for sleuthing and a gift for the written word, Verity is their best bet for solving the mysterious disappearance of celebrity Walker Kahmenos - a cocky and overconfident playboy who is usually quite good at making his presence known wherever he goes. In this gripping narrative, your choices and deductive prowess shape the outcome, and immerse you in a world of intrigue, suspense, and moral dilemma. Will you uncover the secrets beneath the surface or will you succumb to the darkness that grips your home city? The truth awaits your discovery in this new original series from the creators of the rich and chaotic world of G Prime, Soma Games. Take the reigns and crack the case in this interactive fiction series like no other!

Key Features

  • Engage in an enthralling investigation where you puzzle out leads and follow the threads that intrigue you the most.
  • Decide where to conduct your crucial interviews, carefully shaping a path to the truth.
  • Explore a rich, hand-drawn universe filled to the brim with a loveable, detestable cast of characters to meet and greet.
  • Keeps tabs on contacts and suspects through their live social media feeds.
  • Jam out to a calming, cosmic soundtrack intermingled with bustling, vivid ambience.

What Are You Waiting For?

Prepare yourself for a riveting experience in the Reluctant Redemption of Verity Lux: Wishlist today and consider joining our Discord Server to be informed when our demo of chapter 1 goes live!

content_descriptors.notes: This story will contain references and allusions to criminal activity, sexual misconduct, drug and alcohol consumption, and mature themes. Viewer discretion is advised.

short_description: Unravel the mystery behind the disappearance of Druhyus' favorite celebrity playboy, Walker Kahmenos. Join investigative journalist Verity Lux, in this interactive fiction title and follow leads, conduct interviews, and submit your findings as you seek out the truth - before it's too late.
